name: Guacamole With Lots of Tomato
description: Pico de gallo meets guacamole in this tangy-sweet, ultra-light dip.
recipeIngredient: 1 pint chopped ripe beefsteak or Roma tomatoes (about large 3 beefsteak or 8 Roma)

recipeInstructions.text: Season tomatoes and onions with salt to taste. Transfer to a colander set over the sink and allow to drain for ten minutes. Transer tomatoes and onions to a medium bowl and stir in guacamole. Serve immediately with warm tortilla chips.
